text: Backend (Java or Python) Software Engineer (Developer) - #1706 (Remote US only)

text.2: to help Myriad Genetics, Inc.=E2=80=AFdeliver innovative products that allow patients to make life-changing decisions.=E2=80=AFOur genetic screening and testing help to provide actionable insights to empower people to make critical and timely healthcare decisions by using molecular diagnostic tests for hereditary cancer, urological cancer, depression, and other diseases. We are excited about the future and remain committed to advancing the science of personalized medicine as we develop more products to address unmet medical needs.=E2=80=AF
text.3: Myriad=E2=80=99s Ordering Core team builds software solutions that facilitate the efficient flow of patient tests and support other development teams here at Myriad. Our software touches tens of thousands of people every single day.=E2=80=AF=E2=80=AF
text.5: =E2=80=AF(US only) position with flex-work as an option if you are near a Myriad location.=E2=80=AF=E2=80=AF

li: Design and implement the core architecture of our ordering system
li.1: Participate in best practices for development, code review, testing, and deployment

text: Create and document clean, efficient APIs (primarily RESTful and GraphQL)

li.2: Own It and Make it Happen=E2=80=AF

li: A degree in Computer Science or equivalent work experience=E2=80=AF
li.1: 2 + years experience developing web applications in a production environment using Python or Java =E2=80=93 specifically back end
li.2: Strong software engineering fundamentals: design, testing, version control

text: Enjoy writing clean code in Python or Java and willing to work in both

text.16: Myriad Genetics Inc., is a leading personalized medicine company dedicated to being a trusted advisor transforming patient lives worldwide with pioneering molecular diagnostics. Myriad discovers and commercializes molecular diagnostic tests that: determine the risk of developing disease, accurately diagnose disease, assess the risk of disease progression, and guide treatment decisions across six major medical specialties where molecular diagnostics can significantly improve patient care and lower healthcare costs. Myriad is focused on three strategic imperatives: maintaining leadership in an expanding hereditary cancer market, diversifying its product portfolio through the introduction of new products and increasing the revenue contribution from international markets. For more information on how Myriad is making a difference, please visit the Company's website: www.myriad.com .
text.17: WE ARE AN EQUAL OPPORTUNITY EMPLOYER. Applicants and employees are considered for positions and are evaluated without regard to mental or physical disability, race, color, religion, gender,national origin, age, genetic information, military or veteran status, sexual orientation, marital status or any other protected Federal, State/Province or Local status unrelated to the performance of the work involved.
text.18: Please answer all questions completely. Please do not provide any information not specifically requested on this Employment Application form.
